/* PortfolioMapper.portfolioList */
SELECT A.ID , A.RANDOM_ID , A.PORT_ID , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.CATEGORY_ID , A.IMG_FILE_ID , A.FILE_ID , A.START_YMD , A.END_YMD , B.CATEGORY_NM , C.FILE AS IMG_FILE , A.MD_USE_YN , A.MD_DATA FROM PORTFOLIO A LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY B ON A.ID = B.ID AND A.RANDOM_ID = B.RANDOM_ID AND A.CATEGORY_ID = B.CATEGORY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE C ON A.IMG_FILE_ID = C.FILE_ID WHERE A.ID = #{id} AND A.RANDOM_ID = #{randomId} AND A.PORT_ID = #{portId}

/* PortfolioMapper.fileList */
SELECT FILE_ID , FILE_SUB_ID , FILE_NM , FILE , FILE_TYPE , USE_YN FROM FILE WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY FILE_ID, FILE_SUB_ID

select a.id , a.random_id , a.port_id , a.skill_id , a.skill_img_id , a.skill_uri , a.skill_img_title , a.skill_hex from portfolio_skill_detail a join portfolio p on a.id = p.id and a.random_id = p.random_id and a.port_id = p.port_id where a.id = #{id} and a.random_id = #{randomId}
AND P.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
